subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Floyd Landis doesn't care about winning an Alpine stage in the Tour de France.  He just wants to stay close enough to the leaders to have a chance to win the Tour.
snippet: Floyd Landis doesn't care about winning an Alpine stage in the Tour de France.  He just wants to stay close enough to the leaders to have a chance to win the Tour.
